title: Request to Join a Private Subreddit: A Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Open Reddit in your internet browser.
steps.content: Open Reddit in your internet browser. This will bring you to the Reddit front page. [1] X Research source You'll need to use your computer's web browser to request to join a private subreddit. The mobile Reddit app for Android, iPhone, and iPad cannot display private subreddits and won't let you to send a message to a group of moderators. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Sign in to your personal account.
steps.content: Sign in to your personal account. Click Log In in the top-right corner and enter your username and password in the respective fields. You may also log in via Google, Apple, or a magic link sent to your e-mail. If you do not have an account, you can create one from the Reddit front page as well. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click the bell icon next to your username.
steps.content: Click the bell icon next to your username. This opens a dropdown menu with your notifications and your messages. Tap the Messages section on the right to pull up all of your communications on Reddit.

steps.title: Click send a private message.
steps.content: Click send a private message . This button is located next to the inbox tab in the top-left corner of your screen. It will start a new private message. Visiting the private subreddit's page should also present you with the options to Message the Mods or Request to Join , both of which will open this same private message form.

steps.title: Type /r/name of the private subreddit in the "to" field.
steps.content: Type /r/ name of the private subreddit in the "to" field. Entering the subreddit name here will send your message to all of this subreddit's moderators. [4] X Research source If you don't know a private subreddit's /r/name, open the subreddit in your browser and check the end of its URL link in your address bar. For example, if the subreddit URL is www.reddit.com/r/privatesub1/ , you should enter /r/privatesub1 into the "to" field.

steps.title: Enter a relevant subject line in the "subject" field.
steps.content: Enter a relevant subject line in the "subject" field. Make sure your subject line is brief and to the point. Considering something like Request to Join Community .

steps.title: Write a message expressing your desire to join the private subreddit.
steps.content: Write a message expressing your desire to join the private subreddit. In the "message" field, politely explain why you want to join the private subreddit, and request an invite from the moderators. Be sure to consult the About Community and the Rules tabs on the subreddit to see if there is any criteria for membership, so you can include any relevant info in your message. There is no guarantee your join request will be approved. Some private subreddits have very selective criteria for accepting new members.

steps.title: Click the send button.
steps.content: Click the send button. This will send your message to all of this subreddit's moderators.

steps.title: Check your messages inbox for a reply.
steps.content: Check your messages inbox for a reply. Give the moderators some time to read your message, and regularly check your inbox for a reply. If your request is approved, you may receive an invite link from one of the moderators. If you do not get accepted and still want to discuss the topic on Reddit, consider starting your own subreddit.
